title: One For All coming back in 8.6!!!
body:
OUR WAIT IS OVER BRETHREN (brudas?)
According to Riot's post about changes to the RGM, One For All should be coming back in 8.6
Hail Rito!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=YuGiHo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uw2aZPmu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-31T05:59:09.224+0000)
>
> 5 man zoe inc?

riot change of plans ABORT ABORT
relax they will probaly remove zoe from it. didnt they remove yi and Nasus from one for all last time?
pretty sure it was teemo and karthus in the one-for-all mode
I'm pretty sure you can still ban champions in One for All. If that's the case, then Zoe is *still* permabanned
8.6????? Thats like june what the hell
No lol, it wont take them too much max 3 months

What's the point if teemo and karthus aren't gonna be allowed anyway.

But no that's broken, 5 yasuo's ulting cuz one of them managed to land a tornado isn't. Neither is a bunch of gp's chaining on each others' barrrels. And ofcourse 5 nids/zoe's is so balanced and fun.

Either everyone gets to have fun or noone does.
